scripts.deploy: npm run build && cdk deploy --app "npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register bin/ehsaan-stream-api.ts" --all  --region us-east-1 --require-approval never
scripts.destroy: npm run build && cdk destroy --app "npx ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register bin/ehsaan-stream-api.ts" --all  --region us-east-1 --require-approval never
